title: Random game freezes and dc's got low priority Q because of this, PLEASE HELP!
body:
Started earlier today, everything skips and bugs out, get dc'd reconnect and repeat

Run as admin, Repair client, Restart PC, stopped avast from running as I downloaded that yesterday and thought it might interfere with LoL

Here are some screenshots of it happening, I have tried lowest settings also no results, 

4 games I have had bugsplat/randomlagdc's and been punished by leaverbuster twice because of it,

1: randomly died no one on map also and dc'd 30 sec later http://i.gyazo.com/f7d8bff96965e37b44f3be08a9ef1c8b.jpg
2: They were tower diving us but they where not, I asked a mate he said they did not I was just running away randomly http://i.gyazo.com/0c121c4b503e55d3b16097fdf1fba08e.jpg
3: I killed Fiddle but I didn't but I did http://i.gyazo.com/895f44320b7cb277cedd03ec21508361.jpg

No fps drop or high ping in any of these, I got a effin 20 min Q ban for afk/leaving w/e

replies.body:
sounds like my problem, gets the attempting to reconnect then be ok for about 10 seconds then attemtping to reconnect again and so on.
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/tF52khjF-constant-spikes-maybe-packet-loss?comment=0001
this is my thread ive had going for a few weeks now but i cant do a packetloss test coz my computer tells me java isnt enabled and it is, im so over it, and i just got on the 5 game 10 min waits now.

That's the second time I've heard of the machine telling the person that Java isn't installed when it is. Have you made sure that the Java plugin/extension is enabled in your web browser? The default is "Disabled", I believe.
Sometimes during the loading screen I get disconnected and the game tells me that my internet has disconnected and to try connecting again.
I've also had this. I join a game fine and last for a few minutes then disconnect. Can rejoin fine but then a few minutes after reconnecting I dc again.

This might be the result of dropped packets of data. That wouldn't intefere with ping or FPS, but it makes some actions you perform in game just not reach the server.

Have you diagnosed your internet connection with something like http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/ ?
